casebody.data:
Waxelbaum & Son et al. v. Mathews et al. April 29, 1895.

Brought forward from the last term.

Petition for injunction and receiver. Before Judge Griggs. Randolph county. November 14, 1894. Hardeman, Davis & Turner and Hood & Moye, for plaintiffs. W. C. Worrill and W. D. Kiddoo, for defendants. Simmons, C. J.

Under the facts disclosed by the record, there was no abuse of discretion in denying the motion to postpone the hearing, nor in passing the order complained of.

Judgment affirmed.
